o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_AttributeEdit
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Comment:
This edit method is used for the attribute object picker for parent attributes.
Based on the stereotype (input or output) we filter on attribute types.
The parent object must have an computed extended attribute which points to the object to select the attributes from with the name 'mdde_ExampleEntity'.
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj) Dim objExampleEntity If obj.ParentObject.Stereotype = "mdde_Example" Then ' Get a reference to the entity the example is for. Set objExampleEntity = obj.ParentObject.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_ExampleEntity") ElseIf obj.ParentObject.Stereotype = "mdde_ExampleRecord" Then Set objExampleEntity = obj.ParentObject.ParentObject.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_ExampleEntity") End If
' Based on the stereotype of the current object, show an object picker. Dim objExampleAttribute If obj.HasStereotype("mdde_ExampleInputAttributeValue") Then Set objExampleAttribute = SelectInputAttribute(objExampleEntity) ElseIf obj.HasStereotype("mdde_ExpectedOutputAttributeValue") Then Set objExampleAttribute = SelectOutputAttribute(objExampleEntity) Else Set objExampleAttribute = SelectAnyAttribute(objExampleEntity) End If
' If a source object was selected, go on. If Not(objExampleAttribute Is Nothing) Then obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_Attribute", objExampleAttribute End If End Sub
